remarks: Continuity of inner product; analogue of ~ cnmpt12f which cannot be used directly because ` .i ` is not a function.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 13-Oct-2015.)
statement:
cnmpt1ip.j $e |- J = ( TopOpen ` W ) $.
cnmpt1ip.c $e |- C = ( TopOpen ` CCfld ) $.

cnmpt1ip.a $e |- ( ph -> ( x e. X |-> A ) e. ( K Cn J ) ) $.
cnmpt1ip.b $e |- ( ph -> ( x e. X |-> B ) e. ( K Cn J ) ) $.
cnmpt1ip $p |- ( ph -> ( x e. X |-> ( A ., B ) ) e. ( K Cn C ) ) $.
